visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have custom styling for axes and labels, including specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent temperature data for each month, with the series name 'Temperature'. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and configure the chart's background and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes custom styling for the axes and labels, with specific colors and font sizes defined for the title, axis labels, and axis titles. The data series represents monthly temperature data, with the series named 'Temperature'. Custom colors are applied to the series and the chart itself, with a background color and margins set for better visual appeal. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart. Overall, this configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart presentation.
